---
title: "valid_yaml_stream.yaml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file contains test data for validating YAML streams in the Flipt feature flag management system. It defines two namespaces, each with flags, segments, and their associated configurations, demonstrating various features and structures used in the Flipt system.

## Code Structure
The file consists of two YAML documents separated by `---`, each representing a different namespace configuration. Both documents follow a similar structure, defining namespaces, flags, and segments.

## Symbols

### Namespace
#### Description
Defines a namespace for organizing flags and segments.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Unique identifier for the namespace |
| name | string | Display name for the namespace |

### Flags
#### Description
Defines feature flags with their properties, variants, rules, and rollouts.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Unique identifier for the flag |
| name | string | Display name for the flag |
| description | string | Description of the flag's purpose |
| enabled | boolean | Whether the flag is enabled or not |
| variants | array | List of variants for the flag |
| rules | array | List of rules for flag distribution |
| rollouts | array | List of rollout configurations |

### Segments
#### Description
Defines user segments for targeting specific groups with feature flags.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| key | string | Unique identifier for the segment |
| name | string | Display name for the segment |
| description | string | Description of the segment's purpose |
| match_type | string | Type of matching for the segment (e.g., ALL_MATCH_TYPE) |
| constraints | array | List of constraints for segment membership |

## Dependencies
This YAML file doesn't have explicit dependencies, but it's designed to be used with the Flipt feature flag management system.

## Configuration
The file defines configuration for two namespaces:
1. Default namespace (key: default)
2. Custom namespace (key: foo)

Each namespace contains:
- Flags: "flipt" and "boolean"
- Segments: "all-users" and "internal-users"

### Flag Configuration
| Option | Type | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Determines if the flag is active |
| variants | array | Defines different versions of the flag |
| rules | array | Specifies distribution rules for variants |
| rollouts | array | Defines gradual rollout configurations |

### Segment Configuration
| Option | Type | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:------------|
| match_type | string | Determines how constraints are applied |
| constraints | array | Defines criteria for segment membership |

This YAML file serves as a comprehensive example of various configurations possible within the Flipt system, including boolean flags, multivariate flags with variants, segment-based targeting, and percentage-based rollouts.
